label: 栄華物語
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A history of Japan (889-1092).↓It is a history of the Imperial Court in forty-one books (kan), covering the period 889-1092.  It centers around the glorious period of Civil Dictator (Kampaku) Fujiwara Michinaga.  The first thirty books may have been written by Akazome Emon or Fujiwara Tamenari, and the last ten by some unknown person or persons.  There is one book of table of contents and genealogies (Part A, p. 364).  [巻、関白、藤原道長、赤染衛門、藤原為成]
